briefTitle: Automated Method for Breast Cancer Detection
officialTitle: Automated Method for Breast Cancer Detection
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Correlation of Diagnostic Cartridge With Histopathology as Assessed by Number of Participants With Same Diagnosis From Both Cancer Detection Cartridge and Core Biopsy or Resected Lesion
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient must be female
* Patient must be 18 years of age or older
* Patient has been recommended for ultrasound core needle biopsy of a suspicious breast lesion

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients may be excluded for any condition that in the opinion of the investigator may not make it safe to take part (e.g. certain medicines).
